StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.name: [GetChildOrgs]
StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.body:
@ParentOrgID int, @OrgType varchar(3) = NULL AS
SELECT RO.ORGANIZATION_ID, RO.SHORT_NAME, RO.NAME, RO.ORGANIZATION_TYPE FROM RECRUITING_ORGANIZATION RO WITH (NOLOCK) INNER JOIN ORGANIZATION_MAP OM ON (RO.ORGANIZATION_ID = OM.CHILD_ORGANIZATION_ID AND OM.PARENT_ORGANIZATION_ID = @ParentOrgID AND ((@OrgType = 'OSS' AND RO.ORGANIZATION_TYPE = 'OSS') OR (COALESCE(@OrgType, SPACE(0)) != 'OSS' AND RO.ORGANIZATION_TYPE != 'OSS')) AND RO.ISOPEN = 'Y') ORDER BY RO.SHORT_NAME
